name: Para-Shooter
description:
"Greetings, Private Para-Shooter! Your mission is to parachute behind enemy lines and use your machine gun to shoot down missiles. Be careful! The enemy has an array of different weapons, so stay on your toes! Make sure you shoot down as many as you can on your way down. Good luck, soldier!"

Master your reflexes in this fast-paced action game as you fall endlessly and shoot down missiles to compete against the world for the highest score!
